column4: Morning all - I'm looking for a purdy email client to replace my gmail. I don't like thunderbird/evolution for the eyecandy. Any thoughts?
what are your feelings about a terminal-based client?
my feelings are that I would go crazy. I need to handle 3 gmail accounts from the one gui
actually, most text-based clients (like Mutt) are actually easier to use with many disparate accounts. automatic filtering, rule-based envelope headers, &cet.
